name: Tilt Five Drone (Tilt Five required)
description:
Tom's Tilt five Drone is a little project I started when I got my Tilt Five. At the moment you can simply fly round a little map (free unity asset) but I'll add things as I go. Time trial circuit etc at a later date.

The controls.

Hold the wand sideways (trigger on the left).

Tilt wand forward to tilt drone forward.

Tilt wand sideways to  tilt drone sideways.

Rotate  wand to turn.

Use the joystick to increase drone lift.

T5 button opens Menu, allowing you to reset the level or quit.
